name: Lost in Translation (Stephen Hoffman)
description:
Crashed on Earth, new to the planet? Fear not, here are a handful of cards with an alien’s language on them to communicate what you need to everyone. Send messages to your allies by spelling words before the enemy can decrypt them. If your friends can’t help you before time runs out, the opposing team can use that chance to swoop in and crack it. Whichever team deciphers the most messages wins the game.

Lost in Translation is a word party game for 3-10 players and ages 11+. I worked on the game design and gameplay of this project. I also put together a presentation to present to a publishing company.  You can subscribe to the Tabletop Simulator Mod here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2339425460 or download the rules and cards here.
